appName.$comment:
Determines the expected prefix on the names of
config files and environment variables.
If `undefined` then parse the name from the
package name in `./package.json`.

configPath.description: Path to the configuration file to be parsed.
configPath.$comment:
If `undefined`, then will search for a file
`config.ts` in the current directory and its
subdirectories.

jsonSchemaPath.description: Path to the JSON Schema file to be generated.
jsonSchemaPath.$comment:
If `undefined`, then will be the path of the
config file with extension `.json.schema` instead of
`.ts`.

readmePath.description: Path to the README file to be updated.
